text: Hakon Magne Valdemar Wrangell (2 January 1859 - 31 August 1942) was a Norwegian ship owner and politician. Wrangell was born in Haugesund to telegrapher Hans Marcus Wrangell and Cecilie Tjerandsen. He was elected representative to the Stortinget for the periods 1904-1906, 1907-1909, 1922-1924 and 1925-1927, for the Liberal Left Party. From 1927 to 1930 he was President of the Norwegian Shipowners' Association. ==References== Category:1859 births Category:1942 deaths Category:People from Haugesund Category:Free-minded Liberal Party politicians Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians Category:Members of the Storting
title: Hakon Magne Valdemar Wrangell
